Image Creation
GL Image

Manual ImageSet creation classes.

ImageSet is a closed class; it has no exposed constructor. This is due to the need to ensure that the data generated by loaders remains intact and valid. However, it is often useful to be able to either write your own loaders for other forms of data, or simply to create an ImageSet from user generated data.

The ImageCreator class is a factory for generating an ImageSet. Once it has generated one, that particular class instance cannot be used again.
